name: Dark Star
summary:
Collect powerful weaponry, Destroy all aliens and the Boss! 
 
Features: 
- Full HD 2D platforming action game. 
- Handcrafted sprites and animations. 
- 4 regular stages, plus one Boss stage. 
- 9 enemies, 17 erotic animations. 
- Easy to use cheat mode (unlock all stages, all weapons, all gallery) 
- Xbox360 controller support!​
